story.text: Jan 2 EGL Inc. EAGL.O said its largest shareholder Chief Executive Officer James Crane and General Atlantic LLC have proposed to acquire the company for $36 per share in cash. The offer price represents a premium of about 21 percent to the stock's Friday closing price. The shipping company said Crane presently beneficially owns about 18 percent of its outstanding common stock. (Reporting by Swagata Gupta in Bangalore)
story.title: egl says receives buy - out offer from ceo
